title: Slow cooker vinegar pork
ingredients: ['6 carrots, peeled and cut in half', '6 potatoes, washed but not peeled', '1 (1.1kg) pork shoulder joint', '1 large onion, sliced', '3 cloves garlic, chopped', '1 1/2 teaspoons crushed chillies or to taste', '1 bay leaf', '425g passata', '175ml distilled malt vinegar', 'salt and pepper to taste']
